text: Kid vs. Kat is a Canadian animated television series produced by Studio B Productions and aired on YTV in Canada. It was also aired on Jetix and Disney XD in the USA. It also had live-action films, such as Jurassic Park and its sequels. == Plot == In a town named Bootsville, Coop Burtonburger's life soon shatters when he realizes that his new pet named Kat is an evil creature known as a Catnipian, a species of alien that resembles a Sphynx cat from the planet Kat Nebula, with a fantastical hate for humankind, and an unassuming evil plan. The two battle daily as the young boy tries to warn other people of Kat's evil nature, only to find his evidence destroyed by him and deemed a fool. The only person that believes him is his friend, Dennis Lawrence Chan, who often aids him in fighting the evil Kat. In the second season, they are joined by Coop's love interest, Fiona Munson, who also aids them in fighting Kat. title: Kid vs. Kat
